get_username[source]

get_username()

Returns the active username in the computer

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
u = get_username()
assert isinstance(u, str)
assert len(u) > 0
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_datetime[source]

get_datetime()

Returns the time now

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
d = get_datetime()
assert isinstance(d, str)
{% endraw %}
